JOB DESCRIPTION: We are looking for a Software Developer to build and implement functional programs. You will work with other Developers and Product Manager throughout the software development cycle. In this role, you should be a team player with a keen eye for detail and problem-solving skills. Your objective will be to build proficient programs that serve client needs.      Experience:      0-2 yrs      Qualification:      B.E (CSE/ISE)      Requirements       Knowledge of languages(PHP, JavaScript, MySQL) and frameworks/systems(Joomla, Laraval).      Ability to learn new languages and technologies.      Good communication skills.
